nodes.description: Houses the Turbines that generates the steam.
nodes.name: Turbine Building

nodes.description: Houses the pumps that moves the coolant water around.
nodes.name: Pump Building

nodes.description: This is the building that houses the switches to supply or received power from the electricity grid.
nodes.name: Switch Compound

nodes.description:
This is where the power plant admin staff and operators are housed.

It has both the Power Station LAN and Enterprise WAN.
nodes.name: Administration Block

nodes.description: This is the military controlled accommodation.
nodes.name: Military Compound

nodes.description:
The reactor generates thermal heat by causing a nuclear reaction. 

The course control system is powered by the station 50V DC battery.
nodes.name: Reactor HMI and ICS

nodes.description: The turbines are responsible for generating electricity from the stream generated by the thermal heat.
nodes.name: Gas Turbines HMI and ICS

nodes.description: The pumping station is required to deliver the water that is used to extract the heat from the gas and convert it into steam for the generators.
nodes.name: Pump Water coolant House HMI and ICS

nodes.description: The power distribution system stores and switches the power generated to deliver to the national grid.
nodes.name: Switch Compound HMI and ICS

nodes.description: Manages the nuclear waste material that is generated as a result of the Nuclear Reactors.
nodes.name: Waste Treatment HMI and ICS

nodes.description: The enterprise network used to locally manage the ICT requirements of the Power plant.
nodes.name: Power Station LAN

nodes.description: The enterprise network used to manage the wider ICT requirements of the Power plant including interconnections with other Power Stations and other organisation units belonging to the same organisation.
nodes.name: Power Station Enterprise WAN

nodes.description: The connections with the Internet and any or all other organisations that require and ICT connection with the Trawsfynydd Power station and parent company.
nodes.name: Internet Access

nodes.description: The military network that connects to other parts of the UK military network in order to meet the tasking order.
nodes.name: Military Network
